meanings.definition: Rutheniums: a chemical element with the symbol Ru and atomic number 44.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study rutheniums to learn about their properties.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician handled the vial containing rutheniums carefully.
meanings.sent3: When the rutheniums threw a party, all the other elements wanted to join!
meanings.sent4: The importance of rutheniums in catalysis is like a hidden gem in chemistry.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, rutheniums shimmered like tiny stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Rutheniums: plural form of ruthenium, referring to multiple units of the element.
meanings.sent1: The jewelry store displayed various rutheniums for sale.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use rutheniums in different experiments to observe their behavior.
meanings.sent3: At the element gathering, the rutheniums were the life of the party!
meanings.sent4: In the periodic table dance, rutheniums twirled gracefully with other elements.
meanings.sent5: The abundance of rutheniums in the sample surprised the researchers.
